attributes.action: Make illegal immigrants join the army.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Illegal immigrants found entering the country or wanting to enter should be given a choice.
1. They can become citizens of the UK after 10 years of Army service. This would include serving in Afghanistan. 
2. Immediate deportation back to their country of origin.  
These should be the only choices given to these people.
